name: Berserker
description: A Berserker is clad in furs or piecemeal armor, wielding massive weapons like great axes or clubs. They exhibit a brutal fighting style driven by rage, allowing them to shrug off injuries.
memorable: Known for their ability to unleash powerful attacks in a frenzied state, making them dangerous opponents in combat.
goals: To engage in battle and conflict, driven by a desire to prove their strength.
relations: Often found among tribal or wild societies, they may serve as shock troops or warriors in larger war bands.
environment: Hailing from uncivilized lands, they prefer areas conducive to conflict and warfare.
strengths: High physical strength and resilience, particularly effective in melee combat with multiattack capabilities.
weaknesses: Low tactical thinking and agility, making them vulnerable to coordinated attacks.
attacks: The Berserker can make two melee attacks in one turn, using a greataxe to deal high slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Bloodied Frenzy, granting advantage on all attacks when bloodied, making them formidable and dangerous opponents.
equipment: Greataxe and potentially a Handaxe for ranged combat.
senses: Passively perceives environments with a perception score of 10.
skills: Proficient in athletics and intimidation, making them effective in physical confrontations and social scenarios.
additional_information: Employs reckless attacks that can turn the tide of battle.
Rely on raw power and bloodlust rather than strategy.
Ability to shrug off wounds due to high constitution.
Vulnerable to counterattacks due to reckless fighting style.
Easily overwhelmed without support from allies.
